title: Critical Language Awareness Education for Multilingual Learners’ Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic communication skills in native and second languages
context.additional_context: Enhanced interactive activities in a smartphone-based LMS environment, establishing a peer mentoring system among multilingual learners

learning_goals: Learners can express critical thinking about language use by analyzing case studies across five language awareness domains: cognitive, performative, affective, social, and empowerment.
Learners can develop three or more strategies for utilizing multilingual resources through peer feedback and reflective journaling.
Learners can simulate and implement communication strategies between at least two languages via online collaborative activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
